title: Shattered Souls: The Car Barn Murders | Episode Two: "Seeing Can Be Deceiving"
itunes:title: Shattered Souls: The Car Barn Murders | Episode Two: "Seeing Can Be Deceiving"
description:
A look at a brand new true crime podcast series from former detective Karen Smith. In this podcast, Karen begins reconstructing the moments of the murders of James Mitchell and her great uncle, Emory Smith, which leads to difficult questions. Was it really an inside job like everyone thought? 

Subscribe to the Shattered Souls podcast now to hear all new episodes! Episodes 1-8 available NOW! New episodes every Tuesday.

Apple Podcast

iHeart

Spotify

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
